channel.title: Stellar Dawn Cancelled (aka MechScape)
channel.description:
Quote from Jagex Stellar Dawn Blog:
[u][b]StellarDawn cancelled but coming soon[/b][/u] StellarDawn has been cancelled but will be coming soon because Jagex will be going back to the drawing board to re-create it from scratch using parts of the the original StellarDawn (code-named Mechscape)
The blog then released an interview which I will sumarize if it is to long to read.
[u][b]StellarDawn Interview[/b][/u] --SD B is the maker of the blog, MMG is the Jagex Representative StellarDawn Blog: Hey, thanks for joining us. MMG: My pleasure. StellarDawn Blog: We hear you've scrapped Mechscape aka StellarDawn. MMG: That is not exactly true. We haven't scrapped anything. StellarDawn Blog: Then? MMG: We have scrapped Mechscape because there were creative differences and technical misinformations. StellarDawn Blog: Wait a minute. Isn't Mechscape the same as StellarDawn? MMG: Not really. Mechscape is the name of what we were working on before, and StellarDawn is the name of what we'll do now. StellarDawn is like a newer version of Mechscape. StellarDawn Blog: You're confusing me. So what you're saying is that you scrapped Mechscape because it didn't live up to your standards and now you're calling the new version StellarDawn? MMG: Yes. StellarDawn Blog: What made you scrap Mechscape at this point? MMG: We didn't like it. It didn't live up to our expectations. StellarDawn Blog: Where were you during the past 2 or 3 years? Didn't you see Mechscape going off track? Why did you notice that Mechscape wasn't living up to your standards so late? MMG: Next question please. StellarDawn Blog: Okay... Some people are wondering if this whole story is even true. Some people think that Jagex's decision to rename Mechscape to Stellardawn and tell everybody that the game will be scrapped and redone is just a marketing scheme. MMG: What do you mean "marketing scheme"? StellarDawn Blog: Well, people obviously saw the leaked video of Mechscape, and it looked a lot like RuneScape. You've been saying that Mechscape will be totally unique from Runescape. MMG: We didn't exactly say that... StellarDawn Blog: So it sounds like a PR scheme to make people think that the crappy game we saw in the leaked video is Mechscape and that you'll give us something new called StellarDawn. MMG: See, Jagex is fond of surprises. We want to give our users a great big surprise when StellarDawn is launched. We don't want their surprise to be tarnished by any ... preconceptions. StellarDawn Blog: So it's true. You just want people to be excited about the game and not remember any leaked videos of "Runescape in space". MMG: Yes. StellarDawn Blog: ... Thank you, MMG. MMG: Your very welcome.
This means that what Jagex has been working on the last few years (MechScape) has been cancelled. They are taking part of what they had, and starting over with the name StellarDawn. So they have many years ahead until we may see what this is like.
Well, people obviously saw the leaked video of Mechscape, and it looked a lot like RuneScape.
Yeah. Cool. Here it is: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aF6q2N0yS6M (Thanks Alec' for link) inb4 removed by jagex

item.title: Stellar Dawn Cancelled (aka MechScape)
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:1, topic:318749”]Quote from Jagex Stellar Dawn Blog:

StellarDawn cancelled but coming soon

StellarDawn has been cancelled but will be coming soon because Jagex will be going back to the drawing board to re-create it from scratch using parts of the the original StellarDawn (code-named Mechscape)

The blog then released an interview which I will sumarize if it is to long to read.

[quote]StellarDawn Interview --SD B is the maker of the blog, MMG is the Jagex Representative

StellarDawn Blog: Hey, thanks for joining us.
MMG: My pleasure.
StellarDawn Blog: We hear you’ve scrapped Mechscape aka StellarDawn.
MMG: That is not exactly true. We haven’t scrapped anything.
StellarDawn Blog: Then?
MMG: We have scrapped Mechscape because there were creative differences and technical misinformations.
StellarDawn Blog: Wait a minute. Isn’t Mechscape the same as StellarDawn?
MMG: Not really. Mechscape is the name of what we were working on before, and StellarDawn is the name of what we’ll do now. StellarDawn is like a newer version of Mechscape.
StellarDawn Blog: You’re confusing me. So what you’re saying is that you scrapped Mechscape because it didn’t live up to your standards and now you’re calling the new version StellarDawn?
MMG: Yes.
StellarDawn Blog: What made you scrap Mechscape at this point?
MMG: We didn’t like it. It didn’t live up to our expectations.
StellarDawn Blog: Where were you during the past 2 or 3 years? Didn’t you see Mechscape going off track? Why did you notice that Mechscape wasn’t living up to your standards so late?
MMG: Next question please.
StellarDawn Blog: Okay… Some people are wondering if this whole story is even true. Some people think that Jagex’s decision to rename Mechscape to Stellardawn and tell everybody that the game will be scrapped and redone is just a marketing scheme.
MMG: What do you mean “marketing scheme”?
StellarDawn Blog: Well, people obviously saw the leaked video of Mechscape, and it looked a lot like RuneScape. You’ve been saying that Mechscape will be totally unique from Runescape.
MMG: We didn’t exactly say that…
StellarDawn Blog: So it sounds like a PR scheme to make people think that the crappy game we saw in the leaked video is Mechscape and that you’ll give us something new called StellarDawn.
MMG: See, Jagex is fond of surprises. We want to give our users a great big surprise when StellarDawn is launched. We don’t want their surprise to be tarnished by any … preconceptions.
StellarDawn Blog: So it’s true. You just want people to be excited about the game and not remember any leaked videos of “Runescape in space”.
MMG: Yes.
StellarDawn Blog: … Thank you, MMG.
MMG: Your very welcome.[/quote]
This means that what Jagex has been working on the last few years (MechScape) has been cancelled. They are taking part of what they had, and starting over with the name StellarDawn. So they have many years ahead until we may see what this is like.

Well, people obviously saw the leaked video of Mechscape, and it looked a lot like RuneScape.

Yeah. Cool. Here it is: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aF6q2N0yS6M (Thanks Alec’ for link)
inb4 removed by jagex[/quote]

Late.

Read full topic

item.title: Stellar Dawn Cancelled (aka MechScape)
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

"What do you mean "marketing scheme"?

The ? should be inside the quotation marks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 06-01-2010, 20:55:06[/size][hr][quote=“Davidi2, post:24, topic:318749”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=415214.msg3089553#msg3089553 date=1262775249]
Old news
[/quote]
Not to all people.

MMG: Your very welcome.[/quote]

This chatlog is fake. He’s what, 30? Making spelling mistakes of 12 year olds? I don’t think so.

It was either a typed+recorded phonecall or an IM service. People can miss a letter.[/quote]

regardless if a letter or word is missing or not, this interview doesn’t sound professional.

Read full topic
